ctx: intros x y z H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment x, y, z : t H1 : O.lt x y H2 : O.lt y z Unable to unify "Prop" with "O.lt x z".

ctx: intros x y z H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment x, y, z : t H1 : O.lt x y H2 : O.lt y z Unable to unify "(BinNat.N.compare ?M1493 ?M1494 <> Lt -> ~ BinNat.N.lt ?M1493 ?M1494) /\\ (~ BinNat.N.lt ?M1493 ?M1494 -> BinNat.N.compare ?M1493 ?M1494 <> Lt)" with "O.lt x z".

original: intros x y z H1 H2. unfold lt in *. apply BinNat.N.lt. apply BinNat.N.compare_nlt_iff. unfold BinNat.N.lt in *. eapply BinNat.N.compare_trans. apply eq_sym in H1. apply BinNat.N.compare_nge_iff in H1. apply eq_sym in H2. apply BinNat.N.compare_nge_iff in H2. auto.
